answers.answer: Please someone give us a little note on this.  My doctor just called me with the same message.  I had gall blade operation in feb. thanks

question: Hello!  What are the possible reasons for an enlarged common bile duct.  I have had some severe pain in the upper abdomen and had an ultrasound.  That is when they found the duct enlarged.  Also, probably unrelated, I have Type 1 diabetes and  recurring bacteria in my urinalysis.  Thanks for any help!
title: Enlarged common bile duct
